net.sf.freecol.common.networking

Class RearrangeColonyMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.freecol.common.networking.DOMMessage
      • net.sf.freecol.common.networking.RearrangeColonyMessage

  • public class RearrangeColonyMessage
extends DOMMessage
    The message sent when the client requests rearrangeing of a colony.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RearrangeColonyMessage.UnitChange
      Container for the unit change information.

      A list of unitChanges to make.

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Are there no changes present?
        Returns:
        True if no changes have been added.

      • addChange

        public void addChange(Unit unit,
                      Location loc,
                      GoodsType work,
                      Role role,
                      int roleCount)
        Add a change to this message.
        Parameters:
        unit - The Unit that is to change.
        loc - The destination Location for the unit.
        work - The GoodsType to produce (may be null).
        role - The unit Role.
        roleCount - The role count.

      • handle

        public org.w3c.dom.Element handle(FreeColServer server,
                                  Player player,
                                  Connection connection)
        Handle a "rearrangeColony"-message.
        Parameters:
        server - The FreeColServer handling the request.
        player - The Player rearrangeing the colony.
        connection - The Connection the message is from.
        Returns:
        An update Element with the rearranged colony, or an error Element on failure.
